hadiths.text: It was narrated that Qais bin Sa'd bin 'Ubadah Said:"We used to fast on 'Ashura and give Zakatul-Fitr, and when the command to fast in Ramadan was revealed, and the command to give Zakah was revealed, we were neither commanded to give it, nor told not to do so, and we used to do it

chapter.ara-name: باب فَرْضِ صَدَقَةِ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ نُزُولِ الزَّكَاةِ
chapter.eng-name: Sadaqatul Fitr Was Enjoined Before The Command To Give Zakah Was Revealed
